CHAT.comment: DIRECTOR OF REVENUE OF MISSOURI, Petitioner v. CoBANK ACB, AS SUCCESSOR TO THE NATIONAL BANK FOR COOPERATIVES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:13 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES R. LAYTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID C. FREDERICK ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT [*18] OF RICHARD A. HANSON ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES R. LAYTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:07 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
